Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.map

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Subject
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.map.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmmoCell, SavedCell, SpawnCell
    public abstract class Cell
extends Subject
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is abstract and represents the generic cell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.awt.Point adjEast
      point of the cell east from this, will be set to null if the cell does not exist or there's a wall between

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell()
        Default constructor

      • Cell

        public Cell​(CellColor color,
            java.awt.Point adjNorth,
            java.awt.Point adjSouth,
            java.awt.Point adjEast,
            java.awt.Point adjWest)
        This constructor can be used to initialize the Cell passing some parameters
        Parameters:
        color - Cell color
        adjNorth - a Cell adjacent to the north of the Cell which is going to be constructed, null if there are none
        adjSouth - a Cell adjacent to the south of the Cell which is going to be constructed, null if there are none
        adjEast - a Cell adjacent to the east of the Cell which is going to be constructed, null if there are none
        adjWest - a Cell adjacent to the west of the Cell which is going to be constructed, null if there are none

      • Cell

        public Cell​(Cell clone)
        This constructor is used to return a copy of the Cell passed as a parameter
        Parameters:
        clone - Cell to be cloned

        public boolean alreadyVisited()
        Method useful for canSee method inside Player class
        Returns:
        true if the Cell has been already visited by the canSee algorithm, false otherwise

        method used to replace AmmoCard in AmmoCell

      • getAmmoPlaced

        public abstract AmmoCard getAmmoPlaced()
        Returns:
        the Ammocard placed in the cell if it is an AmmoCell or null otherwise

      • pickAmmoPlaced

        public abstract AmmoCard pickAmmoPlaced()
        Returns:
        the only reference to the AmmoCard placed in the cell and sets it to null if it is an AmmoCell or null otherwise

      • getWeapons

        public abstract java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
        Returns:
        the list of weapon contained in the cell, that will be empty if the cell has no weapon, or null if the cell is not a spawn cell

      • buy

        public abstract Weapon buy​(Weapon w,
                           Player player)
                    throws NotEnoughAmmoException
        Parameters:
        w - is the weapon reference
        player - is the player that wants to buy it
        Returns:
        the weapon's reference if the cell is Spawn or null otherwise
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player can not pay for it

      • getSaveVersionOfCell

        public abstract SavedCell getSaveVersionOfCell()
        This method will be used to handle save
        Returns:
        a savable version of the cell

      • getAdjacencienceDirection

        public Directions getAdjacencienceDirection​(Cell cell)
        This method will return the direction in which a given cell is adjacent to this cell
        Parameters:
        cell - is another cell
        Returns:
        null if the cells are not adjacent or the direction if them are

      • getCellAdj

        public Cell getCellAdj​(Directions direction)
        This method do the same as the adj getter but take as input the direction
        Parameters:
        direction - is the direction of the adj required
        Returns:
        the cell adj to this in the given direction
